sentences.en: A hydroelectric plant by the huge dam is idle.
sentences.cn: 大坝旁的水电工厂被闲置.

sentences.en: Hydroelectric power plants of today generate a lot more electricity.
sentences.cn: 现在的水力发电厂则能够产生更多的电力.

sentences.en: IN TODAY'S green world, hydroelectric dams are often unwelcome.
sentences.cn: 在当今这个绿色世界, 水电站的大坝通常不受欢迎.

sentences.en: It be important that we build more hydroelectric power station.
sentences.cn: 我们建立更多的水力发电站,这是重要的.

sentences.en: It is the power behind a 880 megawatt hydroelectric generating station.
sentences.cn: 它是一座880百万瓦水力发电站的主要动力来源.

sentences.en: Like China's Taihang Mountains , they are rich in coal and hydroelectric potential.
sentences.cn: 象中国的太行山一样, 这条山脉也富有煤矿和水电资源.

sentences.en: My two papers were published in Hubei Hydroelectric Power last year.
sentences.cn: 还在《湖北水力发电》上发表了两篇论文.

sentences.en: Plans are being drawn up to build a big hydroelectric station here.
sentences.cn: 这里正在筹划建设一座大型水电站.

sentences.en: Plans are being drawn up to build a hydroelectric station here.
sentences.cn: 这里正筹划建设一座水力发电站.

sentences.en: Standing on the river are two hydroelectric power stations.
sentences.cn: 座落在这条河上是两座水电站.

sentences.en: The hydroelectric station is as good as completed.
The hydroelectric station is nearing completion.
The soil washed from the hills is silting up the hydroelectric dams.
sentences.cn: 从山上冲刷下来的泥土就要让水电大坝淤塞了。

sentences.en: The southern falls are a source of hydroelectric power.
sentences.cn: 南边的瀑布是水力电能的来源.

sentences.en: This machine uses the hydroelectric power.
sentences.cn: 这台机器使用的是水力发电的能量.

trans.tran_en: using water power to produce electricity
